## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install ctxt in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure ctxt package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to ctxt
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/civvic/ctxt):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/civvic/ctxt.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/civvic/ctxt)

``` sh
$ conda install -c civvic ctxt
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/ctxt/)

``` sh
$ pip install ctxt
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/civvic/ctxt)’s
[pages](https://civvic.github.io/ctxt/). Additionally you can find
package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/civvic/ctxt) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/ctxt/) respectively.
